channel.title: Post a tut on adding dialogue.java to a server (delta)(ranqm)
channel.description: Will my server doesnt have dialogue.java i need it for coding my server so i can make npc talk im not leeching ddue to the fact that RANDQM cleaned the server and their is no npc's nothing on except skills.

dalacity and the PZ distru’s have a dialoguehandler class,
for the older releases it will be located in the packets class
